inclusion.criterion: Histologic proof of prostatic adenocarcinoma without evidence of regional and/or distant metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical stage T1, T2 or T3 with high grade disease (Gleason's grade 7 or above)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Recent (less than or equal to 6 weeks prior to study entry) negative bone scan and CT scan of abdomen/pelvis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Appropriate surgical candidate for radical prostatectomy and a performance status of less than or equal to 2 (Zubrod scale)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function defined as an absolute peripheral granulocyte count greater than or equal to 1,500 and platelet count of greater than or equal to 100,000
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic function with a bilirubin less than or equal to 1.5 mg % and SGPT less than 2.5x the upper limits of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal function defined as serum creatinine less than or equal to 2.0 mg %
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal coagulation profile (PT, PTT) and no history of substantial non-iatrogenic bleeding diatheses
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign an informed consent indicating that they are aware of the investigational nature of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of bifascicular block or active ischemia on EKG
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have no history of congestive heart failure or previous MI
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous or current hormonal treatment, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy or other investigational status drug
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP. Further evaluation revealed normal recent blood chemistry.
